dialogue: Oh NO!! There's plastic coming into the water!!
I don't know why I'm surprised, this happens 24/7...
Almost 10 million tons of plastic gets into the ocean every year..!
Some big corporations like to dump their waste into our home..
And others like to throw their empty bottles or food containters here..
This makes it harder to live here.. but we don't have a choice. :(
Just so you know: the amount of plastic gets denser the further down you go..
If you're planning to go deeper, stay safe friend!
